short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts the toothless term 'alt right' to what it really means: Nazi

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Everyone is calling the new breed of fascists "alt right" when they really mean "Nazi." This will convert all instances of the weak, normalized version to what they should be really saying: Nazi.
